ygData.subject: Re: new character
ygData.msgSnippet: Welcome back, Bigfish! ... Zardus looks down at his wrist comp as it reports a new pod in the area. He taps his comm, sending an order to DevilDuer.

Welcome back, Bigfish!

::Zardus/DevilDuer::

Zardus looks down at his wrist comp as it reports a new pod in the 
area. He taps his comm, sending an order to DevilDuer.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer sighs as Zardus's orders to get the new pod come in over 
the comm.

"Yeah yeah, on my way," he says, running to the equipment room and 
putting on a water suit. He runs out of the Iron Fist and dives into 
the water, heading for the new bot.
